title: YinQin 4 PCS Double Layer Wire Dishwashing Cloth Rags 20x28 cm Non Scratch Stainless Steel Mesh Cleaning Cloth Multi Purpose Two Layer Metal Wire Dish Cloths Towel for Kitchen, Dish, Sink, Stove Top
features: 【4 PCS or 8 PCS for Choice, Double Layer Wire Dishwashing Rags】: The package includes 4 or 8 pcs double-layer metal wire dishwashing rags, providing you with ample cleaning supplies for your daily kitchen needs. Each steel wire cleaning cloth rag measures 7.87x11 inches in size. Rust-Resistant & Easy to Clean…Made from high-quality stainless steel, this dish cleaning cloth is rust-resistant and easy to maintain. Simply rinse under water after use to keep it clean and ready for the next task.

【Multipurpose Use】: These Double-layer steel wire mesh scrubbers are not only suitable for cleaning dishes but also for various other household tasks. You can use them to clean kitchen countertops, stovetops, sinks, windows, mirrors, and more. They are also great for removing stains, grease, and dirt from various surfaces without leaving any residue. The double-layer design provides enhanced strength and flexibility, ensuring long-lasting performance for heavy-duty cleaning tasks like scrubbing pots, pans, grills, and oven racks.

【Non-Scratch and Durable】: The metallic wire cleaning cloths made of high-quality stainless steel wire, these wire dishwashing rags are durable and scratch-resistant, Soft yet effective scrubbing surface won't damage delicate cookware or surfaces. ensuring that they won't wear out or damage your delicate cookware or dishes over time. Designed with a smooth, double-layer stainless steel construction, this metel cleaning cloth effectively removes tough grime and residues without scratching or damaging surfaces. Perfect for stainless steel, cast iron, ceramic, and glass cookware.

【Premium Quality】: Our double layer wire steel dishwashing cloth rags are made from high-quality materials, which are Long-lasting, soft, and non-scratch. The stainless steel wire cleaning cloth is strong and rust-resistant. Say goodbye to disposable scrubbers! This reusable steel wire cleaning cloth is an eco-friendly choice that reduces waste and saves you money over time. We recommend replacing it with a new metal wire cleaning cloth every 1-2 months.

【 Versatile & Multi-Purpose 】: Ideal for a wide range of cleaning applications, from kitchen cookware to outdoor grills and tools. Its flexible design allows you to reach tight corners and curves effortlessly. Upgrade your cleaning routine with the Double-Layer Scratch-Free Steel Wire Cleaning Cloth tough on grime, gentle on surfaces! Add to Cart now!
description: Elevate your cleaning routine with these double layer steel wire cleaning cloths. These multipurpose and durable metallic cleaning cloths are designed for heavy-duty scrubbing without scratching surfaces. The non-scratch material is perfect for tackling tough messes on dishes, sinks, stove tops, and more. With four metal wire dishwasher cloths in a pack, you'll always have a fresh one on hand. Measuring 20x28 cm, these reusable wire dishcloths are generously sized for efficient cleaning. Bid farewell to single-use paper towels and embrace an eco-conscious cleaning solution that lasts. Effortlessly remove stubborn grime and baked-on spills with these versatile steel wire cleaning cloths.
